instruction: Describe the character described below in maximum of 100 words.
input: Tom is a young man in his twenties who has blue eyes, a slim build and wavy brown hair
output: Tom is a young man in his early twenties with an attractively slim build. He has mesmerizing deep blue eyes and wavy, brown locks that perfectly frame his face. Tom has a gentle, yet strong and determined gaze, with a warm and inviting smile. He radiates a quiet confidence and exudes a charming and captivating aura.
